content.raw:
Hmm, I’ve been scanning levels until all artifact poses are detected before I start iterating artifacts.  We could certainly add some warnings here.

Another thing I tried was scanning through all of the levels at the beginning, but I ran into issues loading/unloading all of the levels that quickly.  I may need to recheck that with the SceneBroadcaster improvements.
content.html:
Hmm, I’ve been scanning levels until all artifact poses are detected before I start iterating artifacts. We could certainly add some warnings here.

Another thing I tried was scanning through all of the levels at the beginning, but I ran into issues loading/unloading all of the levels that quickly. I may need to recheck that with the SceneBroadcaster improvements.
